tool_description: Get the latest E-Sports news from multiple sources
name: Esports News
title: Esports News

api_list.name: Get All Esports News
api_list.description: This will return all news regrding esports
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://esports-news.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "esports-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://esports-news.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "esports-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
